articles.content: On a Saturday afternoon in the middle of March, Cade Cunningham walks into a studio at the Detroit Pistons Performance Center and plops himself down in front of a big-screen television that has a Zoo… [+18525 chars]

articles.title: South Carolina vs. Creighton - Women's NCAA tournament Elite Eight highlights - March Madness
articles.description: South Carolina proves why they’re the No. 1 seed with an 80-50 win over Creighton in the Elite Eight. The Gamecocks move on to the Final Four for the fourth ...
